Scrabble: Tiles Points

Source: R/scrabble.R
scrabble_points.Rd

Dataframe for every letter and points given a language.

Usage

scrabble_points(language)

Arguments

language

Character. Any of "en","es".

Value

data.frame with tiles and scores for each letter.

See also

Other Scrabble: scrabble_dictionary(), scrabble_score(), scrabble_words()

Examples

scrabble_points("es")
#> >>> Loaded points for 'es'
#>    tiles scores
#> 1      a      1
#> 2      b      3
#> 3      c      2
#> 4      d      2
#> 5      e      1
#> 6      f      4
#> 7      g      3
#> 8      h      4
#> 9      i      1
#> 10     j      8
#> 11     k     10
#> 12     l      1
#> 13     m      3
#> 14     n      1
#> 15     ñ      8
#> 16     o      1
#> 17     p      3
#> 18     q      5
#> 19     r      1
#> 20     s      1
#> 21     t      1
#> 22     u      2
#> 23     v      4
#> 24     w     10
#> 25     x     10
#> 26     y      5
#> 27     z     10
scrabble_points("en")
#> >>> Loaded points for 'en'
#>    tiles scores
#> 1      a      1
#> 2      b      4
#> 3      c      4
#> 4      d      2
#> 5      e      1
#> 6      f      4
#> 7      g      3
#> 8      h      3
#> 9      i      1
#> 10     j     10
#> 11     k      5
#> 12     l      2
#> 13     m      4
#> 14     n      2
#> 15     o      1
#> 16     p      4
#> 17     q     10
#> 18     r      1
#> 19     s      1
#> 20     t      1
#> 21     u      2
#> 22     v      5
#> 23     w      4
#> 24     x      8
#> 25     y      3
#> 26     z     10
# Not yet available
scrabble_points("fr")
#> We do not have the points for this language yet!
